00033 /**
00034  * \file
00035  *  Checkpoint library implementation for the Tmote Sky platform.
00036  * \author
00037  *  Fredrik Osterlind <fros@sics.se>

00040 #include "contiki.h"
00041 #include "lib/checkpoint.h"

00043 #include "sys/rtimer.h"
00044 #include "sys/mt.h"
00045 #include "cfs/cfs.h"
00046 #include "cfs/cfs-coffee.h"
00047 #include "dev/leds.h"
00048 #include "dev/watchdog.h"

00051 #include <msp430.h>
00052 #else
00053 #include <io.h>

00055 #endif

00057 
00058 #include <stdio.h>
00059 
00060 #define DEBUG 1
00061 #if DEBUG
00062 #define PRINTF(...) printf(__VA_ARGS__)
00063 #else
00064 #define PRINTF(...)
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #define COMMAND_ROLLBACK 1
00068 #define COMMAND_CHECKPOINT 2
00069 #define COMMAND_TBR 3
00070 
00071 #define DATA_AS_HEX 0 /* If false, store binary data */
00072 
00073 #define INCLUDE_RAM 1 /* Less then 10240 bytes */
00074 #define INCLUDE_TIMERS 1 /* 16 bytes */
00075 #define INCLUDE_LEDS 1 /* 1 bytes */
00076 
00077 // 8kB memory 
00078 #define RAM_START 0x1100
00079 #define RAM_END 0x30FF
00080 
00081 #define STOP_TIMERS() TACTL &= ~(MC1); TBCTL &= ~(MC1); watchdog_stop();
00082 #define START_TIMERS() watchdog_start(); TACTL |= MC1; TBCTL |= MC1;
00083 
00084 static struct mt_thread checkpoint_thread;
00085 static uint8_t preset_cmd;
00086 static int preset_fd;
00087 
00088 typedef union {
00089   unsigned char u8[2];
00090   unsigned short u16;
00091 } word_union_t;
00092 
00093 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 static void
00095 write_byte(int fd, uint8_t c)
00096 {
00097 #if DATA_AS_HEX
00098   uint8_t hex[2];
00099   sprintf(hex, "%02x", c);
00100   if(cfs_write(fd, hex, 2) != 2) {
00101     printf("err #1\n");
00102   }
00103 #else /* DATA_AS_HEX */
00104   if(cfs_write(fd, &c, 1) != 1) {
00105     printf("err #2\n");
00106   }
00107 #endif /* DATA_AS_HEX */
00108 }/*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00109 #if 0
00110 static void
00111 write_array(int fd, unsigned char *mem, uint16_t len)
00112 {
00113 #if DATA_AS_HEX
00114   int i;
00115   for(i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00116     write_byte(fd, mem[i]);
00117   }
00118 #else /* DATA_AS_HEX */
00119   cfs_write(fd, mem, len);
00120 #endif /* DATA_AS_HEX */
00121 }
00122 #endif /* 0 */
00123 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00124 static void
00125 write_word(int fd, uint16_t w)
00126 {
00127   word_union_t tmp;
00128   tmp.u16 = w;
00129   write_byte(fd, tmp.u8[0]);
00130   write_byte(fd, tmp.u8[1]);
00131 }
00132 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00133 static uint8_t
00134 read_byte(int fd)
00135 {
00136 #if DATA_AS_HEX
00137   uint8_t hex[2];
00138 
00139   cfs_read(fd, hex, 2);
00140 
00141   if(hex[0] >= 'A' && hex[0] <= 'F') {
00142     hex[0] = (hex[0] - 'A' + 0xa);
00143   } else if(hex[0] >= 'a' && hex[0] <= 'f') {
00144     hex[0] = (hex[0] - 'a' + 0xa);
00145   } else {
00146     hex[0] = (hex[0] - '0');
00147   }
00148   if(hex[1] >= 'A' && hex[1] <= 'F') {
00149     hex[1] = (hex[1] - 'A' + 0xa);
00150   } else if(hex[1] >= 'a' && hex[1] <= 'f') {
00151     hex[1] = (hex[1] - 'a' + 0xa);
00152   } else {
00153     hex[1] = (hex[1] - '0');
00154   }
00155   return (uint8_t)((hex[0]<<4)&0xf0) | (hex[1]&0x0f);
00156 #else /* DATA_AS_HEX */
00157   uint8_t c;
00158   cfs_read(fd, &c, 1);
00159   return c;
00160 #endif /* DATA_AS_HEX */
00161 }
00162 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00163 static uint16_t
00164 read_word(int fd)
00165 {
00166   word_union_t tmp;
00167   tmp.u8[0] = read_byte(fd);
00168   tmp.u8[1] = read_byte(fd);
00169   return tmp.u16;
00170 }
00171 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00172 static void
00173 thread_checkpoint(int fd)
00174 {
00175 #if INCLUDE_RAM
00176   unsigned char *addr;
00177   uint16_t size = 0;
00178   unsigned char *thread_mem_start = (unsigned char *)&checkpoint_thread.thread.stack;
00179   unsigned char *thread_mem_end = thread_mem_start + sizeof(checkpoint_thread.thread.stack) - 1;
00180   unsigned char *coffee_mem_start = cfs_coffee_get_protected_mem(&size);
00181   unsigned char *coffee_mem_end = coffee_mem_start + size - 1;
00182 #endif /* INCLUDE_RAM */
00183 
00184   /*printf("protected thread memory: %u, size=%u\n", (uint16_t) thread_mem_start, sizeof(checkpoint_thread.thread.stack));*/
00185   /*printf("protected coffee memory: %u, size=%u\n", (uint16_t) coffee_mem_start, size);*/
00186 
00187   /* RAM */
00188 #if INCLUDE_RAM
00189   for(addr = (unsigned char *)RAM_START;
00190       addr < (unsigned char *)RAM_END;
00191       addr++) {
00192 
00193     if((addr >= thread_mem_start && addr <= thread_mem_end)) {
00194       /* Writing dummy memory */
00195       /*write_byte(fd, 1);*/
00196       continue;
00197     }
00198 
00199     if((addr >= coffee_mem_start && addr <= coffee_mem_end)) {
00200       /* Writing dummy memory */
00201       /*write_byte(fd, 2);*/
00202       continue;
00203     }
00204 
00205     /* TODO Use write_array() */
00206     write_byte(fd, *addr);
00207 
00208     if(((int)addr % 512) == 0) {
00209       PRINTF(".");
00210     }
00211   }
00212 
00213 #endif /* INCLUDE_RAM */
00214 
00215   /* Timers */
00216 #if INCLUDE_TIMERS
00217   write_word(fd, TACTL);
00218   write_word(fd, TACCTL1);
00219   write_word(fd, TACCR1);
00220   write_word(fd, TAR);
00221 
00222   write_word(fd, TBCTL);
00223   write_word(fd, TBCCTL1);
00224   write_word(fd, TBCCR1);
00225   write_word(fd, TBR);
00226 #endif /* INCLUDE_TIMERS */
00227 
00228   /* LEDs */
00229 #if INCLUDE_LEDS
00230   write_byte(fd, leds_arch_get());
00231 #endif /* INCLUDE_LEDS */
00232 
00233   /* Radio */
00234   /* ADC */
00235   /* ... */
00236 
00237   write_byte(fd, -1); /* Coffee padding byte */
00238 }
00239 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00240 static void
00241 thread_rollback(int fd)
00242 {
00243 #if INCLUDE_RAM
00244   unsigned char *addr;
00245   uint16_t size = 0;
00246   unsigned char *thread_mem_start = (unsigned char *)&checkpoint_thread.thread.stack;
00247   unsigned char *thread_mem_end = thread_mem_start + sizeof(checkpoint_thread.thread.stack) - 1;
00248   unsigned char *coffee_mem_start = cfs_coffee_get_protected_mem(&size);
00249   unsigned char *coffee_mem_end = coffee_mem_start + size - 1;
00250 #endif /* INCLUDE_RAM */
00251 
00252   /*printf("protected thread memory: %u, size=%u\n", (uint16_t) thread_mem_start, sizeof(checkpoint_thread.thread.stack));*/
00253   /*printf("protected coffee memory: %u, size=%u\n", (uint16_t) coffee_mem_start, size);*/
00254 
00255   /* RAM */
00256 #if INCLUDE_RAM
00257   for(addr = (unsigned char *)RAM_START;
00258       addr < (unsigned char *)RAM_END;
00259       addr++) {
00260     if((addr >= thread_mem_start && addr <= thread_mem_end)) {
00261       /* Ignoring incoming memory */
00262       /*read_byte(fd);*/
00263       continue;
00264     }
00265 
00266     if((addr >= coffee_mem_start && addr <= coffee_mem_end)) {
00267       /* Ignoring incoming memory */
00268       /*read_byte(fd);*/
00269       continue;
00270     }
00271 
00272     *addr = read_byte(fd);
00273 
00274     if(((int)addr % 512) == 0) {
00275       PRINTF(".");
00276     }
00277   }
00278 
00279 #endif /* INCLUDE_RAM */
00280 
00281   /* Timers */
00282 #if INCLUDE_TIMERS
00283   TACTL = read_word(fd);
00284   TACCTL1 = read_word(fd);
00285   TACCR1 = read_word(fd);
00286   TAR = read_word(fd);
00287 
00288   TBCTL = read_word(fd);
00289   TBCCTL1 = read_word(fd);
00290   TBCCR1 = read_word(fd);
00291   TBR = read_word(fd);
00292 #endif /* INCLUDE_TIMERS */
00293 
00294   /* LEDs */
00295 #if INCLUDE_LEDS
00296   leds_arch_set(read_byte(fd));
00297 #endif /* INCLUDE_LEDS */
00298 
00299   /* Radio */
00300   /* ADC */
00301   /* ... */
00302 
00303   read_byte(fd); /* Coffee padding byte */
00304 }
00305 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00306 static void
00307 thread_loop(void *data)
00308 {
00309   uint8_t cmd;
00310   int fd;
00311 
00312   while(1) {
00313     /* Store command and file descriptor on stack */
00314     cmd = preset_cmd;
00315     fd = preset_fd;
00316 
00317     /* Handle command */
00318     if(cmd == COMMAND_ROLLBACK) {
00319       PRINTF("Rolling back");
00320       thread_rollback(fd);
00321       PRINTF(" done!\n");
00322     } else if(cmd == COMMAND_CHECKPOINT) {
00323       PRINTF("Checkpointing");
00324       thread_checkpoint(fd);
00325       PRINTF(" done!\n");
00326     } else if(cmd == COMMAND_TBR) {
00327       PRINTF("Writing TBR");
00328       write_word(fd, TBR);
00329       PRINTF(" done!\n");
00330     } else {
00331       printf("Error: unknown command: %u\n", cmd);
00332     }
00333 
00334     /* Return to main Contiki thread */
00335     mt_yield();
00336   }
00337 }
00338 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00339 int
00340 checkpoint_arch_size()
00341 {
00342   return 10258;
00343 }
00344 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00345 void
00346 checkpoint_arch_checkpoint(int fd)
00347 {
00348   STOP_TIMERS();
00349 
00350   preset_cmd = COMMAND_CHECKPOINT;
00351   preset_fd = fd;
00352   mt_exec(&checkpoint_thread);
00353 
00354   START_TIMERS();
00355 }
00356 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00357 void
00358 checkpoint_arch_rollback(int fd)
00359 {
00360   STOP_TIMERS();
00361 
00362   preset_cmd = COMMAND_ROLLBACK;
00363   preset_fd = fd;
00364   mt_exec(&checkpoint_thread);
00365 
00366   START_TIMERS();
00367 }
00368 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00369 void
00370 checkpoint_arch_init(void)
00371 {
00372   mt_init();
00373   mt_start(&checkpoint_thread, thread_loop, NULL);
00374 
00375   /*mt_stop(&checkpoint_thread);*/
00376   /*mt_remove();*/
00377 }
